select.loggers: Select which messages you want to see in console output

confirm.delete_user: Do you really want to delete user `{username}`
confirm.delete_database: Do you really want to delete database `{database_name}`

database.empty: There's nothing to see. The table is empty.

moonfile.undefined_command: During the Moonfile parsing, an unknown `{command}` command was detected, it was skipped.
moonfile.no_port_app: [bold white]APP[/bold white]: You did not specify [white]`port`[/white]. The default value is [bold white]{default_port}[/bold white]

user.need_create_user: First you need to create user
user.low_permissions:
Only a person with `{minimal_permissions}` level access or higher can execute this command. 
You are a `{permissions}` now.
user.self_admin:
You cannot create a user named `{self_admin_name}`. 
It's reserved.

database.not_author:
You are not the creator of `{database_name}`. 
Only the creator can delete the database.

moonfile.no_host_app: [bold white]APP[/bold white]: requires two arguments ([white]`port`[/white] is optional, default: [bold white]{default_port}[/bold white]). You have not passed [bold white]`host`[/bold white]
moonfile.params_create_user: [bold white]CREATE_USER[/bold white]: requires three arguments ([white]`permissions`[/white], [white]`username`[/white], [white]`password`[/white]). You passed [bold white]{length_args}[/bold white]
moonfile.undefined_logger_type: [bold white]LOG[/bold white]: accepts only [bold white]`{default_loggers}`[/bold white] loggers. Undefined logger was found [bold white]{undefined_logger}[/bold white]
moonfile.undefined_user: [bold white]DATABASE[/bold white]: first you need to create user. Undefined user was found [bold white]{undefined_user}[/bold white]
moonfile.no_params_database: [bold white]DATABASE[/bold white]: requires two arguments ([white]`author`[/white] is optional, default: [bold white]{default_author}[/bold white]). You have not passed [bold white]`database name`[/bold white]
